channel.title: Pucks Across The Pondcast (mp3)
channel.description: Welcome to Pucks Across The Pond. This is a view of all things hockey from the United Kingdom.
channel.itunes:author: patp
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to Pucks Across The Pond. This is a view of all things hockey from the United Kingdom.
channel.itunes:keywords: hockey, nhl, eihl, canada, bih, uk, us

item.title: PATP - Episode 39 - All Change
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: With Aaron having technical problems, Bradley is joined by Chris Bower and Anthony Russell, as they chat about the Detroit Red Wings record breaking home streak, the Winter Classic between the Wings and Toronto Maple Leafs. There is also a look at the Washington Capitals how things have gone for them and Bruce Boudreau since the split. Trades come up and some breaking news on a three way trade. All that and more.
item.description: With Aaron having technical problems, Bradley is joined by Chris Bower and Anthony Russell, as they chat about the Detroit Red Wings record breaking home streak, the Winter Classic between the Wings and Toronto Maple Leafs. There is also a look at the Washington Capitals how things have gone for them and Bruce Boudreau since the split. Trades come up and some breaking news on a three way trade. All that and more.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, winter, classic, trades, detroit, washington, toronto, red wings, capitals, maple leafs, ovechkin, lidstrom

item.title: PATP - Episode 38 - Who Would You Punch
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: In this week's episode, Aaron is joined by PucksATP editor Chris Bower to talk hockey. After discussing a few of the weeks events, Bradley is able to join the boys for some hockey talk. Technology, hits, goals, fights and which hockey player has the most punchable face are just a few of the things you can hear on this week's edition of the Pucks Across the Pond podcast.
item.description: In this week's episode, Aaron is joined by PucksATP editor Chris Bower to talk hockey. After discussing a few of the weeks events, Bradley is able to join the boys for some hockey talk. Technology, hits, goals, fights and which hockey player has the most punchable face are just a few of the things you can hear on this week's edition of the Pucks Across the Pond podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, pittsburgh, gomez, price, red wings, goalies, maple leafs, howard, league, winter classic, montreal canadiens, subban, bettman, crosby

item.title: PATP - Episode 37 - All Star Weekend
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week the boys tackle the All-Star game, which includes an on site interview with Aaron Murphy. Aside from that they chat about the weeks news, including a fiesty game between Detroit Red Wings and St Louis Blues. Trades involving the Calgary Flames and Chicago Blackhawks and Alex Ovechkin's reaction to the suspension. Also, as much as they avoid it there is more Sidney Crosby news.
item.description: This week the boys tackle the All-Star game, which includes an on site interview with Aaron Murphy. Aside from that they chat about the weeks news, including a fiesty game between Detroit Red Wings and St Louis Blues. Trades involving the Calgary Flames and Chicago Blackhawks and Alex Ovechkin's reaction to the suspension. Also, as much as they avoid it there is more Sidney Crosby news.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, all star, team, chara, alfredsson, ovechkin, blackhawks, howard, red wings, ottawa, columbus, datsyuk, kane, hardest, shot

item.title: PATP - Episode 36 - Hits, Hits & Suspensions
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week the boys discuss the week's news and happenings in the NHL. Including Dustin Penner signing pancakes and how well he has handled the attention. They also touch on the sophmore years of last season's Calder candidates and how well they are actually doing. After all that they get into discussions about the various hits and suspensions. Including Alex Ovechkin's hit on Zbynek Michalek and how his own hit on Matt Hendricks may have inpacted that. There is talk of inconsistency from refs after Henrik Zetterberg is given a game misconduct for boarding too. The boys do touch on Tim Thomas' Whitehouse refusal, but more on that next week as the podcast was recorded before details came out.
item.description: This week the boys discuss the week's news and happenings in the NHL. Including Dustin Penner signing pancakes and how well he has handled the attention. They also touch on the sophmore years of last season's Calder candidates and how well they are actually doing. After all that they get into discussions about the various hits and suspensions. Including Alex Ovechkin's hit on Zbynek Michalek and how his own hit on Matt Hendricks may have inpacted that. There is talk of inconsistency from refs after Henrik Zetterberg is given a game misconduct for boarding too. The boys do touch on Tim Thomas' Whitehouse refusal, but more on that next week as the podcast was recorded before details came out.
item.itunes:keywords: washington, capitals, boston, bruins, detroit, red wings, toronto, maple leafs, ovechkin, zetterberg, michalek, hendricks, thomas, obama, nhl

item.title: PATP - Episode 35 - Sleepless In Belfast
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: It finally happened. The boys have had their first meet. In this weeks bumper episode they chat about their weekend meet, which included less touching than many would imagine. Then focus switches to Anthony's interview with Lyle Richardson. After that they are joined by Rob McGregor as they chat about goalies, the 2013 Winter Classic, awards and the weeks hockey news. It's their biggest podcast yet.
item.description: It finally happened. The boys have had their first meet. In this weeks bumper episode they chat about their weekend meet, which included less touching than many would imagine. Then focus switches to Anthony's interview with Lyle Richardson. After that they are joined by Rob McGregor as they chat about goalies, the 2013 Winter Classic, awards and the weeks hockey news. It's their biggest podcast yet.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, vezina, hart, norris, masterton, jack adams, crosby, howard, quick, red wings, belfast, keefe, richardson, winter classic, 2013, oilers, senators, bruins, rangers, flyers, maple leafs

item.title: PATP - Episode 34 - Happy New Year
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week the boys try to keep the talk purely about hockey... They fail! Along with talk of concussion, suspensions for racism, the plight of the Pittsburgh Penguins, new hockey movie Goon, the sad closing of Bristol Ice Rink and more. They also get sidetracked on politics, morals, their upcoming meet, drinks and whatever else can actually distract them.
item.description: This week the boys try to keep the talk purely about hockey... They fail! Along with talk of concussion, suspensions for racism, the plight of the Pittsburgh Penguins, new hockey movie Goon, the sad closing of Bristol Ice Rink and more. They also get sidetracked on politics, morals, their upcoming meet, drinks and whatever else can actually distract them.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, avery, new york rangers, pittsburgh, penguins, detroit, red wings, toronto, maple leafs, belfast, bristol, ice, rink, save, subban, marchand, salo, howard, crosby, khl, rumour, winter classic, philadelphia, flyers

item.title: PATP - Episode 33 - Jamie Leach, Zombies & Concussions
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week, the boys cover concussions, the Flyers' concussions, more concussion talk, a player deficating in a glove, and Aaron gets heated about Brendan Shanahan's job. PucksATP editor and contributor Rob McGreggor interviews two-time Stanley Cup winner Jamie Leach in the podcast's first NHL interview. The is talk of yet another sacking, this time Montreal Canadiens' Jacques Martin and we wish everyone a zombie themed Christmas.
item.description: This week, the boys cover concussions, the Flyers' concussions, more concussion talk, a player deficating in a glove, and Aaron gets heated about Brendan Shanahan's job. PucksATP editor and contributor Rob McGreggor interviews two-time Stanley Cup winner Jamie Leach in the podcast's first NHL interview. The is talk of yet another sacking, this time Montreal Canadiens' Jacques Martin and we wish everyone a zombie themed Christmas.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, jamie leach, philadelphia, flyers, montreal canadiens, washington capitals, jimmy howard, nik lidstrom, jacques martin, zombies, christmas

item.title: PATP - Episode 32 - Crosby Is A Vampire
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the weeks happenings in the NHL, including a busy period for Brendan Shanahan. The calls he got right, the ones he got wrong. Jordin Tootoo on Ryan Miller, Ville Leino's ghost elbow and the big talking point of Andy Sutton's 8 game suspension. Talk also moves to Ryan Lambert (@twolinepass) and his entertaining phone in on the Alex Ovechkin PED's issue with John Steigerwald. Bradley then ditches Aaron for Aaron as he grabs an interview with Aaron Murphy of ESPN America and the MurphOnIce blog. You can follow Murph on twitter (@murphonice).
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the weeks happenings in the NHL, including a busy period for Brendan Shanahan. The calls he got right, the ones he got wrong. Jordin Tootoo on Ryan Miller, Ville Leino's ghost elbow and the big talking point of Andy Sutton's 8 game suspension. Talk also moves to Ryan Lambert (@twolinepass) and his entertaining phone in on the Alex Ovechkin PED's issue with John Steigerwald. Bradley then ditches Aaron for Aaron as he grabs an interview with Aaron Murphy of ESPN America and the MurphOnIce blog. You can follow Murph on twitter (@murphonice).
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, crosby, sutton, tootoo, miller, leino, ovechkin, twolinepass, murphonice, ped, buffalo, washington, nashville, howard

item.title: PATP - Episode 31 - But I Digress
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week, the boys cover Ovi's love live, steroid allegations and play. They cover who's hot and who's not, talk about Shanahan's latest rulings, Miller getting run again. We also talk about the merger with European NHL Fans. and much, much more on this week's edition of the podcast.
item.description: This week, the boys cover Ovi's love live, steroid allegations and play. They cover who's hot and who's not, talk about Shanahan's latest rulings, Miller getting run again. We also talk about the merger with European NHL Fans. and much, much more on this week's edition of the podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, bih, tv, medge, bettman, ami, europe, capitals, ducks, miller, sabres, tootoo, washington, pittsburgh, ovechkin

item.title: PATP - Episode 30 - Together At Last
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley present for the first time together in while. There is plenty to discuss, with the fallout from the Milan Lucic, Ryan Miller incident. They chat about just how good Sidney Crosby's return was. The breaking news of Bruce Boudreau's firing, along with Carolina's Paul Maurice. Finally they look at the league at Thanksgiving.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley present for the first time together in while. There is plenty to discuss, with the fallout from the Milan Lucic, Ryan Miller incident. They chat about just how good Sidney Crosby's return was. The breaking news of Bruce Boudreau's firing, along with Carolina's Paul Maurice. Finally they look at the league at Thanksgiving.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl. penguins, crosby, malkin, sabres, boudreau, buffalo, boston, bruins, return, washington, ovechkin, gretzky

item.title: PATP - Episode 29 - A Great Day For Hockey
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Bradley is joined by Chris as Aaron has work commitments. Up for discussion this week is the state of the Washington Capitals, where do the problems lay, who is to blame? They discuss some of the magical moments from the last week as well as the controversial incidents, including the Milan Lucic and Ryan Miller moment. Then attention turns to the return of a certain Mr Sidney Crosby and the media frenzy around it. For the record, Bradley was spectacularly wrong about how it would affect the Pittsburgh Penguins against the New York Islanders
item.description: This week Bradley is joined by Chris as Aaron has work commitments. Up for discussion this week is the state of the Washington Capitals, where do the problems lay, who is to blame? item.itunes:keywords: nhl, sidney, crosby, pittsburgh, washington, penguins, capitals, new york, islanders, return, star, media, miller, lucic, buffalo, sabres, boston, bruins

item.title: PATP - Episode 28 - Puck Luck
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week, in Bradley's absence, Aaron is Joined by PucksATP writer Chris Bower. The boys talk about the latest suspensions and fines from Brendan Shanahan, a run of bad luck for players hit by pucks, the Flyers' protest of the Tampa Bay 1-3-1 formation and talk about who's hot and who's not.
item.description: This week, in Bradley's absence, Aaron is Joined by PucksATP writer Chris Bower. The boys talk about the latest suspensions and fines from Brendan Shanahan, a run of bad luck for players hit by pucks, the Flyers' protest of the Tampa Bay 1-3-1 formation and talk about who's hot and who's not.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, pucks, flyers, shanahan, bans, suspension, hot, protest, philadelphia, tampa bay, lightning

item.title: PATP - Episode 27 - Sillyness
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley feel a little bit silly as giggles set in on more than one occassion. Up for discussion this week is an update the the Lokomotiv Yaroslavl disaster, the cracking game between the Philadelphia Flyers and Winnipeg Jets. Was Raffi Torres in the wrong for his halloween costume. The nasty cut on Niklas Grossman's face, the gift from Wayne Gretzky to Alex Ovechkin, the topsy turvy start to the league and you questions.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley feel a little bit silly as giggles set in on more than one occassion. item.itunes:keywords: nhl, hockey, flyers, capitals, red wings, goalies, emonton, oilers, league, lokomotiv, yaroslvl, ovechkin, gretzky, grossman

item.title: PATP - Episode 26 - Two Minutes 'Eye Sticking
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: Bradley returns after a one week break. The boys discuss the week's action with the Washington Capitals' winning run, the Columbus Blue Jackets' losing run and how the Detroit Red Wings contributed to both. The focus turns to the Montreal Canadiens and their issues on and off the ice. Talk of visors plays a large part too, especially after the injury to the Philadelphia Flyers' Chris Pronger. There is also an email to answer and much more.
item.description: Bradley returns after a one week break. The boys discuss the week's action with the Washington Capitals' winning run, the Columbus Blue Jackets' losing run and how the Detroit Red Wings contributed to both. The focus turns to the Montreal Canadiens and their issues on and off the ice. Talk of visors plays a large part too, especially after the injury to the Philadelphia Flyers' Chris Pronger. There is also an email to answer and much more.
item.itunes:keywords: nhl, hockey, eihl, bih, safety, visors, flyers, canadiens, red wings, capitals, blue jackets

item.title: PATP - Episode 25 - Goalies
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week, in Bradley's absence, Pucks Across the Pond writer Rob McGreggor fills in. Rob and Aaron talk about who's hot, who's not, what goalies get the praise and those who don't, the Asham incident and much, much more on this weeks edition of the Pucks Across the Pond podcast.
item.description: This week, in Bradley's absence, Pucks Across the Pond writer Rob McGreggor fills in. Rob and Aaron talk about who's hot, who's not, what goalies get the praise and those who don't, the Asham incident and much, much more on this weeks edition of the Pucks Across the Pond podcast.

item.title: PATP - Episode 24 - Time To Lose That Cherry
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley take a look at the weeks action, they discuss latest comments by Mike Milbury on VS and Don Cherry's on HNIC. Bradley actually gets a bit Don Cherry like during his rant. They discuss the lastest suspension on Pierre-Marc Bouchard, with the boys disagreeing a little on the subject. They tackle the weeks opening games, including the return of the Winnipeg Jets as well as some other action. Dion Phaneuf's big hit against the Ottawa Senators gets a huge amount of support too. Plus a lot more...
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley take a look at the weeks action, they discuss latest comments by Mike Milbury on VS and Don Cherry's on HNIC. Bradley actually gets a bit Don Cherry like during his rant. They discuss the lastest suspension on Pierre-Marc Bouchard, with the boys disagreeing a little on the subject. They tackle the weeks opening games, including the return of the Winnipeg Jets as well as some other action. Dion Phaneuf's big hit against the Ottawa Senators gets a huge amount of support too. Plus a lot more...

item.title: PATP - Episode 23 - Cover 'Em Up For The Lads!
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss Wayne Simmond's abuse aimed towards the controversial Sean Avery. Bradley decides he is being hypocritical in his feelings on the situation. The boys touch again on the European TV Rights and read a statement from Mark Rackham who is doing everything he can to campaign for the cause. Also what about Rico Grimaldi, who says women should cover up? It's what God would want... They also look forward to the new season...the calm before the storm?
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss Wayne Simmond's abuse aimed towards the controversial Sean Avery. Bradley decides he is being hypocritical in his feelings on the situation. The boys touch again on the European TV Rights and read a statement from Mark Rackham who is doing everything he can to campaign for the cause. Also what about Rico Grimaldi, who says women should cover up? It's what God would want... They also look forward to the new season...the calm before the storm?

item.title: PATP - Episode 22 - The Shanaban Hammer
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary:
WE'RE BACK!!!!!!
Aaron and Bradley return to the world of podcasting after a break, due to time constraints and technical failures.
There is plenty to talk about on our return though. Brendon Shanahan has made his presence felt in his new role, by wielding the ban hammer during pre-season. James Wiesnewski one of the players to fall fail to Shanny.
We talk about the unfortunate events during the Philadelphia Flyers game against Detroit Red Wings at John Labatt Center as well as pass on our respects to all those who left us during the off season.
In better news though we really look forward to the new season and Bradley lets rip at Medge and AMI. (it is a NSFW rant)
item.description:
WE'RE BACK!!!!!!
Aaron and Bradley return to the world of podcasting after a break, due to time constraints and technical failures.
There is plenty to talk about on our return though. Brendon Shanahan has made his presence felt in his new role, by wielding the ban hammer during pre-season. James Wiesnewski one of the players to fall fail to Shanny.
We talk about the unfortunate events during the Philadelphia Flyers game against Detroit Red Wings at John Labatt Center as well as pass on our respects to all those who left us during the off season.
In better news though we really look forward to the new season and Bradley lets rip at Medge and AMI. (it is a NSFW rant)

item.title: PATP - Episode 21 - Best Of The Rest
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley do the best they can with a slow week of hockey action. They discuss the best remaining free agents including Teemu Selanne, Fredrik Sjostrom, Kyle Wellwood and Bryan McCabe. The boys also discuss their feelings on the upcoming season for Toronto Maple Leafs and Detroit Red Wings
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley do the best they can with a slow week of hockey action. They discuss the best remaining free agents including Teemu Selanne, Fredrik Sjostrom, Kyle Wellwood and Bryan McCabe. The boys also discuss their feelings on the upcoming season for Toronto Maple Leafs and Detroit Red Wings

item.title: PATP - Episode 20 - Naughty Boy
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the weeks news. Including, Sean Avery's off ice problems, the third trade between the Minnesota Wild and San Jose Sharks and what could be a positive year for the New York Islanders.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the weeks news. Including, Sean Avery's off ice problems, the third trade between the Minnesota Wild and San Jose Sharks and what could be a positive year for the New York Islanders.

item.title: PATP - Episode 19 - The Interview
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley take a quick look at the news. They discuss the Nikolai Kabibulin issue and have a huge coup as they get to interview Britain's Dave Phillips.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley take a quick look at the news. They discuss the Nikolai Kabibulin issue and have a huge coup as they get to interview Britain's Dave Phillips.

item.title: PATP - Episode 18 - Osgood? Or Not So Good?
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley find themselves with a mini podcast. A roundtable was recorded on Sunday night, but went wrong. We will have another one another time. So this week the lads discuss the weeks news and enter into a debate as to whether Chris Osgood deserves a place in the Hall Of Fame (well everyone else has, so why not us)
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley find themselves with a mini podcast. A roundtable was recorded on Sunday night, but went wrong. We will have another one another time. So this week the lads discuss the weeks news and enter into a debate as to whether Chris Osgood deserves a place in the Hall Of Fame (well everyone else has, so why not us)

item.title: PATP - Episode 17 - It's Not On The Air
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley take a very (and we mean very) quick look at the weeks news. Discuss the latest with Pittsburgh Penguins star Sidney Crosby and his latest return. Then it is on to a discussion about TV rights and how behind the times they are, how difficult it is to get into this great sport in the UK unless you are willing to pay out, can someone accidentally fall in love with this sport now? Plus we answer you emails and probably rant a bit too much about ESPN.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley take a very (and we mean very) quick look at the weeks news. Discuss the latest with Pittsburgh Penguins star Sidney Crosby and his latest return. Then it is on to a discussion about TV rights and how behind the times they are, how difficult it is to get into this great sport in the UK unless you are willing to pay out, can someone accidentally fall in love with this sport now? Plus we answer you emails and probably rant a bit too much about ESPN.

item.title: PATP - Episode 16 - Special Guests
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley are joined by special guest Janne Virtanen. The guys talk about the free agency and the trades made over the last week. Including San Jose Sharks, Detroit Red Wings, Toronto Maple Leafs, Washington Captitals, the Brad Richards decision and just how does it affect New York Rangers. Attention then shifts to Janne as he tells us about hockey from an on ice perspective, including injury and concussion issues and finally he reveals which team he will play for next season.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley are joined by special guest Janne Virtanen. The guys talk about the free agency and the trades made over the last week. Including San Jose Sharks, Detroit Red Wings, Toronto Maple Leafs, Washington Captitals, the Brad Richards decision and just how does it affect New York Rangers. Attention then shifts to Janne as he tells us about hockey from an on ice perspective, including injury and concussion issues and finally he reveals which team he will play for next season.

item.title: PATP - Episode 15 - Frenzy
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley talk pretty much exclusively about the Free Agency as they discuss the deals already done and reveal the deals as they happen. Including the Brad Richards saga, who got the best deals, who got robbed and what teams actually need heading into the new season.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley talk pretty much exclusively about the Free Agency as they discuss the deals already done and reveal the deals as they happen. Including the Brad Richards saga, who got the best deals, who got robbed and what teams actually need heading into the new season.

item.title: PATP - Episode 14 - And The Winner Is
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss game 7 of the Stanley Cup Final and the fallout from it. Next up is the 2011 Entry Draft, who picked who and the trades that were made. Philadelphia Flyers crazy trade day as well as a round up of all the other trades. Finally the NHL awards and Nik Lidstrom's decision to stay at Detroit for at least another year.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss game 7 of the Stanley Cup Final and the fallout from it. Next up is the 2011 Entry Draft, who picked who and the trades that were made. Philadelphia Flyers crazy trade day as well as a round up of all the other trades. Finally the NHL awards and Nik Lidstrom's decision to stay at Detroit for at least another year.

item.title: PATP - Episode 13 - Good Things Small Packages
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley bring you a shorter than usual podcast as they record on the eve of Bradley's first holiday in 18 years. The lads discuss the Game 6 of the Stanley Cup final and preview Game 7, between the Vancouver Canucks and the Boston Bruins. They also touch on Paul McLean's move from Detroit Red Wings to Ottawa Senators and the injury to Mason Raymond.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley bring you a shorter than usual podcast as they record on the eve of Bradley's first holiday in 18 years. The lads discuss the Game 6 of the Stanley Cup final and preview Game 7, between the Vancouver Canucks and the Boston Bruins. They also touch on Paul McLean's move from Detroit Red Wings to Ottawa Senators and the injury to Mason Raymond.

item.title: PATP - Episode 12 - Thomas The Tank
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss all the fallout from games 3,4 and 5 of the Stanley Cup Final between the Vancouver Canucks and the Boston Bruins. Including Aaron Rome's hit on Nathan Horton and the NHL's decision to suspend Rome. The performances of Tim Thomas and Roberto Luongo, as well as Thomas' hit on Daniel Sedin. They preview games 6 and 7 and discover why Bradley is desperate for it to finish in 6. They cover all the weeks trade and signing news involving New York Rangers, Philadelphia Flyers, Phoenix Coyotes, Toronto Maple Leafs and Dallas Stars. They also discuss the possibility of removing the 'blindside' component from Rule 48 and the effect that may have on the league. Finally they discuss the most heart-warming story of the week involving Chicago Blackhawks' forward and star Patrick Kane, a 10 year old boy's birthday and a lost game winning puck.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss all the fallout from games 3,4 and 5 of the Stanley Cup Final between the Vancouver Canucks and the Boston Bruins. Including Aaron Rome's hit on Nathan Horton and the NHL's decision to suspend Rome. The performances of Tim Thomas and Roberto Luongo, as well as Thomas' hit on Daniel Sedin. They preview games 6 and 7 and discover why Bradley is desperate for it to finish in 6. They cover all the weeks trade and signing news involving New York Rangers, Philadelphia Flyers, Phoenix Coyotes, Toronto Maple Leafs and Dallas Stars. They also discuss the possibility of removing the 'blindside' component from Rule 48 and the effect that may have on the league. Finally they discuss the most heart-warming story of the week involving Chicago Blackhawks' forward and star Patrick Kane, a 10 year old boy's birthday and a lost game winning puck.

item.title: PATP - Episode 11 - No Biting
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss game 1 and game 2 of the Stanley Cup Final, including some bizarre decisions made on how to use Zdeno Chara and Alex Burrows biting Patrice Bergeron. The Vancouver Green Men also get more love from the show. The guys then look at some of the signings already made and discuss just what will happen with Brad Richards this summer. Finally it is joy all round at the NHL's decision to replace Colin Campbell with Brendon Shanahan is head of discipline for the coming season.

The Vancouver Green Men also get more love from the show. The guys then look at some of the signings already made and discuss just what will happen with Brad Richards this summer. Finally it is joy all round at the NHL's decision to replace Colin Campbell with Brendon Shanahan is head of discipline for the coming season.

item.title: PATP - Episode 10 - Calling Out Zdeno
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss Conference finals, preview the Stanley Cup Final, look at retirements and how they affect the summer business and Aaron calls out Zdeno Chara for a fight
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss Conference finals, preview the Stanley Cup Final, look at retirements and how they affect the summer business and Aaron calls out Zdeno Chara for a fight

item.title: PATP - Episode 9 - A Bright Future
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley talk moaning fans, the Winnipeg rumours, playoff hockey and have a big announcement. Plus you superstitions and much more.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley talk moaning fans, the Winnipeg rumours, playoff hockey and have a big announcement. Plus you superstitions and much more.

item.title: PATP - Episode 8 - Better Late
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Bradley and Aaron talk about the series between Detroit and San Jose, pass out thoughts on to the family of Derek Boogaard, rant about Don Cherry and find out what is in Brad's dreams.
item.description: This week Bradley and Aaron talk about the series between Detroit and San Jose, pass out thoughts on to the family of Derek Boogaard, rant about Don Cherry and find out what is in Brad's dreams.

item.title: PATP - Episode 7 - Caps All Folks!
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley delve into just went wrong for Washington. We show some love for Sean bergenheim and dissect the rest of the round two match ups. In our mailbag this week we discuss tv coverage of hockey in the UK. All this while contending with Bradley watching Game 4 of the Sharks, Wings series.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley delve into just went wrong for Washington. We show some love for Sean bergenheim and dissect the rest of the round two match ups. In our mailbag this week we discuss tv coverage of hockey in the UK. All this while contending with Bradley watching Game 4 of the Sharks, Wings series.

item.title: PATP - Episode 6 - And The Nominees Are...
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the award nominees, Mike Gillis' comments, the first round of the playoffs and look forward to round two. We also discover that neither of us care for the Royals
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the award nominees, Mike Gillis' comments, the first round of the playoffs and look forward to round two. We also discover that neither of us care for the Royals

item.title: PATP - Episode 5 - An Embarrassment
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the GM of the year nominees. The Calder contenders, Mike Wilbon, the NBC deal and playoff round ups.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the GM of the year nominees. The Calder contenders, Mike Wilbon, the NBC deal and playoff round ups.

item.title: PATP - Episode 4 - You're Fired!
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Bradley and Aaron talk about the coaches that have lost their jobs and some that have had a contract extension. Focus then shifts to the playoff opening games and finally some huge thank you to our listeners for listening and getting our downloads past the 100 mark.
item.description: This week Bradley and Aaron talk about the coaches that have lost their jobs and some that have had a contract extension. Focus then shifts to the playoff opening games and finally some huge thank you to our listeners for listening and getting our downloads past the 100 mark.

item.title: PATP - Episode 3.5 - Bonus Round
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This midweek, Aaron and Bradley discuss the final day of the regular season and look forward to the playoffs
item.description: This midweek, Aaron and Bradley discuss the final day of the regular season and look forward to the playoffs

item.title: PATP - Episode 3 - Condolences
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This week Aaron and Bradley open with another discussion on hits. We dissect the weeks hockey, answer our first email and finish on a sombre note with the passing of Mandy Schwartz & EJ McGuire.
item.description: This week Aaron and Bradley open with another discussion on hits. We dissect the weeks hockey, answer our first email and finish on a sombre note with the passing of Mandy Schwartz & EJ McGuire.

item.title: PATP - Episode 2 - Duck (Playoff) Hunting
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: **NOTE** 67 Mins not 497 as shown - We really are trying to fix this issue ** This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the weeks action and give a lot of praise to the Anaheim Ducks, Corey Perry, Ray Emery and Teemu Selanne. We look at how the Stars seem intent on blowing their own playoff hopes. Finally what would happen if the playoffs started at the time of recording?
item.description: **NOTE** 67 Mins not 497 as shown - We really are trying to fix this issue ** This week Aaron and Bradley discuss the weeks action and give a lot of praise to the Anaheim Ducks, Corey Perry, Ray Emery and Teemu Selanne. We look at how the Stars seem intent on blowing their own playoff hopes. Finally what would happen if the playoffs started at the time of recording?

item.title: PATP - Episode 1 - Red Pill or Blue Pill
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: **NOTE** - ONLY 76 MINS LONG - NOT 223 MINS **NOTE** This week Aaron and Bradley talk about how they got into hockey and then catch up on an entire season. Looking at our surprise players, disappointments, trades and playoff predictions. Our first official podcast just so happens to take place on the day of our teams only meeting of the season.

Looking at our surprise players, disappointments, trades and playoff predictions. Our first official podcast just so happens to take place on the day of our teams only meeting of the season.

item.title: PATP - Episode 0 - What's Cooking
item.itunes:author: patp
item.itunes:summary: This is our opening podcast and first test for getting this right. Matt Cooke's suspension dominates the opening show.
